snippet: Sigrid Kaag, the official overseeing the destruction of the weapons, said it was “very, very critical” to remove the final 7.2 percent of the arsenal.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and NICK CUMMING-BRUCE
byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone reported from New York, and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: Sigrid Kaag, the official overseeing the destruction of the weapons, said it was “very, very critical” to remove the final 7.2 percent of the arsenal.

headline.main: U.N. Official Urges Syria to Finish Chemical Arms Disposal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Urges Syria to Finish Chemical Arms Disposal

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
